reason: Bitcoin is currently in a markdown phase, having fallen below $91,000. Bearish options data suggests significant downside risk, with a 30% chance of testing $80,000 by late June. Widespread altcoin losses (Solana, XRP, Cardano) and a memecoin crash indicate a strong risk-off sentiment across the broader crypto market. Additionally, the movement of an old Bitcoin whale's fortune introduces an unpredictable supply element, contributing to potential volatility. Extreme caution is advised.
headlines: 'White Whale' memecoin slides 60% after top holder dumps $1.3 million
Bitcoin has a 30% chance of falling below $80,000 by late June, options data suggests
Bitcoin falls under $91,000 as solana, xrp and cardano nurse weekly losses
Bitcoin whale wakes up after 12 years to move $84 million fortune
XRP slips below $2 after failed breakout triggers sharp reversal
